author: simonetripodi
msg: [ONAMI-52] Use 6.3.0-incubating-SNAPSHOT (not 6.3-incubating-SNAPSHOT) for org.apache.onami.configuration in autobind-configuration - patch provided by Eric Charles

author: markt
msg: Fix various issues highlighted when running the Autobahn test suite on Linux.
- Don't register the socket for a read when a write event completes (may lead to thread starvation)
- Use a dedicated lock rather than the ServletOutputStream to protect the writing of a WebSocket message
- Add a lock to protect the write buffer from concurrent calls to writeInternal()
- Add a lock to ensure a consistent view of buffer and fireListenerLock

author: namit
msg: HIVE-3824 bug if different serdes are used for different partitions

msg: #i121482# fix attributed text search for regular expression patterns
